summary: The document is a letter dated February 20, 1963, from Roger Joyce to Mr. Miguel A. Diaz, confirming Diaz's employment at a rate of $220.09 per month starting March 1st. The employment is part of a study on the effects of large-scale migration on communities, with a focus on the Miami area due to its unique situation with an influx of migrants. The role requires Diaz to spend time in New York offices and travel extensively.
key_findings: Confirmation of employment for Mr. Miguel A. Diaz starting March 1, 1963.
Study focused on the impact of large-scale migration on communities, particularly in Miami.
Employment involves both office work in New York and substantial travel.
